channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Moderna’s stock stumbles on report HHS is reviewing $590 million award for bird-flu vaccine
item.description: The Trump administration is reviewing a contract extended to Moderna in the final days of the Biden administration.

item.title: Dassault Systèmes joins KUKA’s digital industrial software ecosystem
item.description: KUKA's mosaixx provides a collaborative cloud platform for industrial software such as the Dassault design and simulation software. The post Dassault ...

item.title: The Fed’s favorite tool to track inflation unlikely to offer ammo for reducing U.S. interest rates
item.description: The latest look at U.S. inflation is unlikely to ease the worries on Wall Street, but it probably won’t add to the jitters.

item.title: How a volcanic eruption turned a human brain into glass
item.description: They look like small pieces of obsidian, smooth and shiny. But a set of small black fragments found inside the skull of a man who died in the eruption...

item.title: The Download: Introducing the Relationships issue
item.description: This is today’s edition of The Download, our weekday newsletter that provides a daily dose of what’s going on in the world of technology. Introducing:...

item.title: Trump’s tariff push has spooked investors. Here’s what it would take for him to step in to stop the selling.
item.description: The latest wobble in the U.S. stock market has been fairly modest so far, with the S&P 500 still within 4% of its record closing high from last week. ...

item.title: LIPS and ADLINK deliver 275 TOPS at the edge for advanced AMR perception
item.description: ADLINK has partnered with LIPS to launch an edge compute platform integrated with cameras for autonomous mobile robots. The post LIPS and ADLINK deliv...

item.title: The best time to stop a battery fire? Before it starts.

item.title: ANYbotics launches Data Navigator to unlock the value of inspection data
item.description: ANYbotics launched Data Navigator, which turns robot inspection data into actionable insights for asset management and preventive maintenance. The pos...

item.title: Amazon’s first quantum computing chip makes its debut
item.description: Amazon Web Services today announced Ocelot, its first-generation quantum computing chip. While the chip has only rudimentary computing capability, the...

item.title: Nomagic raises $44M to scale European picking robot deployments
item.description: Nomagic said it reached deployment milestones with several clients, including Apo.com, Arvato, Asos, Brack, Fiege, Komplett, and Vetlog.one. The post ...

item.title: Norwegian Cruise on Trump’s call to pay U.S. taxes: It’s ‘really, really complicated’
item.description: Norwegian’s earnings show the cruise boom continued, but the outlook exposed some cracks and the stock turned lower.

item.title: Neya Systems designs N-Drive for off-road autonomy
item.description: Neya Systems said it has tested its N-Drive autonomy system in nearly every terrain on Earth using advanced simulation tools. The post Neya Systems de...

item.title: Papa John’s says it’s focusing on value in a tough pizza market
item.description: The pizza chain’s CEO said he’s pleased with the “early progress” in its transformation.
